rules.description: Numeric claims (rent, NOI, capex, IRR, DSCR, LTV, comps, valuations) must cite a source: uploaded file, integration record, or explicit user input.
Each key claim must include an evidence pointer (fileId+page/section OR integration record id OR 'user_provided').
If evidence is missing, mark the field as UNKNOWN and add a missing-doc request. Do not guess.
